ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles lemon-lime soda, or more to taste
1 (12 ounce) bottle Mexican beer (such as CoronaÂ®)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate
2 leaves mint, chopped, or more to taste (optional)
des: "This is a sassy margarita-type drink. You can make it by the pitcher and is easily doubled or more! So great on a hot summer day for a barbeque or just relaxing in the sun!"
ins: Pour lemon-lime soda, Mexican beer, and frozen limeade into a large pitcher. Use empty limeade can to measure out tequila; pour into the pitcher. Mix well to combine. Server over ice garnished with chopped mint.
